section.title: 读取文件
section.programlisting: f = open('/tmp/workfile', 'r+') f.write('0123456789abcdef') f.seek(5) # Go to the 6th byte in the file f.read(1) f.seek(-3, 2) # Go to the 3rd byte before the end f.read(1) f.readline() f.close()

section.title: 读取二进制文件
section.programlisting: with open('beak', 'rb+') as f: content = f.read() f.seek(0) f.write(content.replace(b'\r', b'')) f.truncate()

section.title: 获取扩展名
section.programlisting:
import os
# 定义一个文件路径 file_path = "/home/user/documents/example.txt"
# 使用os.path.splitext()获取文件名和扩展名 file_name, file_extension = os.path.splitext(file_path)
print("文件名:", file_name) # 输出: 文件名: /home/user/documents/example print("扩展名:", file_extension) # 输出: 扩展名: .txt
file_extension = file_extension[1:] # 去掉点号 print("去掉点号的扩展名:", file_extension) # 输出: 去掉点号的扩展名: txt

import re
filename = "example.txt" extension = re.findall(r"\.[^.]*$", filename)[0] print(extension)

filename = "myfile.txt"
extension = filename.rsplit(".", 1)[1]
print(extension) # 输出：".txt"
